title: Flat Earth Conspiracy - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 11/24/17
itunes:title: Flat Earth Conspiracy - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 11/24/17
description:
Guest host Connie Willis and researcher Mark Sargent explore his analysis of the theory that the Earth is actually flat and not a globe, and why the truth has been hidden from mankind throughout history.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
